about_the_game: The Mission: Exorcist** is a blend of tower defense and RPG elements. Players take on the role of an Exorcist tasked with protecting dimensional gates that open over a span of 15 days in various areas of the Cursed Cathedral. Players must gather resources and summon guardian spirits to build defenses before sunset and survive within the 15-day period. The full game is set to release in October 2024.
